department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: The Canadian Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a one-time delivery of seed tender to the Lethbridge Research and Development Centre.['The
description: Seed Tender to be delivered to the Lethbridge Research and Development Centre
full_summary:
**Release No.** WS4388878287

### Tender Details
#### Title and Status

* **English Title**: 01586-230174 Seed Tender
* **French Title**: Transbordeur de semences
* **Status**: _Cancelled_

#### Notification Information
* **Publication Date**: January 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: January 16, 2024

#### Tender Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a seed transfer system to be delivered to the Lethbridge Research and Development Centre. The system will be used for agricultural purposes.

#### Classified under

* **UNSPSC Code**: 21100000, 21101500, 21101600, 21102100
* **UNSPSC Description**: Agricultural and Forestry Machinery and Equipment, Agricultural Machinery for Soil Preparation, Agricultural Machinery for Planting and Seeding, Agricultural Processing Machinery and Equipment
* **English**: Agriculture and Forestry Machinery and Equipment, Agricultural Machinery for Soil Preparation, Agricultural Machinery for Planting and Seeding, Agricultural Processing Machinery and Equipment
* **French**: Machines et équipement pour l'agriculture, l'exploitation forestière et le paysage, Machines agricoles pour la préparation des sols, Machines agricoles pour la plantation et les semis, Machines et équipements pour l'exploitation agricole

#### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Kristina McArthur, (she/her)
* **Contact Email**: [kristina.mcarthur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mcarthur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
